resources.string: This Application is created/used to calculate Area of land based on Traditional Indian Land Measurements System Also Known As Bigha and Biswa System
Enter your land measurements of each Side(in Feet) into Respective Text Field, Hit Calculate, See Your Results Right There
All Measurements Used is in feet, You Should be using Feet for Your Measurements
This application is distributed without any warranty and support, author of this application will not be responsible for any kind of damage/dispute and inaccuracy in Calculations
if you are interested in contacting me regarding any issues/help/feedback, ping me on twitter or get contact info from my twitter
